synopsis.text: Witness the extraordinary tale of Shouzou and Ine, an elderly couple living a serene life in a quaint farming village in Aomori Prefecture. After stumbling upon a mysterious apple on their farm, they find themselves transformed into vibrant young adults. Despite their miraculous rejuvenation, the couple maintains their gentle, grandparent-like rhythm of life. As they navigate their newfound youth, they continue to nurture their cherished bond and face the unique challenges that come their way. Join this endearing couple as they embark on a heartwarming journey of love, laughter, and life's beautiful surprises.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
